thread.title: Manchester United forward Zlatan Ibrahimovic is defying time and all expectations at Old Trafford
thread.title_full: Manchester United forward Zlatan Ibrahimovic is defying time and all expectations at Old Trafford

author: Jason Burt
title: Manchester United forward Zlatan Ibrahimovic is defying time and all expectations at Old Trafford
text:
I t is still remarkable to think that around this time last year, when it became apparent that Paris St-Germain were not intending to offer Zlatan Ibrahimovic a new contract, he turned down a tax-free €70 million (£60 million) a year to play in China .
Ibrahimovic did not want to go to China – where the authorities planned to make him the ‘face’ of the Chinese Super League – partly because his wife, Helena, said she preferred to stay in Europe or go to the United States and the MLS, if they were to leave Paris. But Ibrahimovic also had unfinished business.
Of course it was in his nature to let it be known the Chinese wanted to make him the highest-paid player in the world by some distance – the salary was almost double the £615,000 a week (£32 million) that Shanghai Shenhua are paying Carlos Tévez , who is regarded as the best-remunerated footballer on the planet after his recent move.
But the...
